text: Maaris Meier (born 22 May 1983) is a Mountain bike rider and road cyclist from Estonia. She represented her nation at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. She won the silver medal at the 2008 World University Cycling Championship in the Cross-country. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Estonian female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Estonia Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tallinn Category:1983 births Category:Cyclists at the 2015 European Games Category:European Games competitors for Estonia Category:Universiade medalists in cycling Category:Universiade silver medalists for Estonia Category:Medalists at the 2011 Summer Universiade
title: Maaris Meier
